For many years Victims of crime have not been listened to by Governments. The only way we as families of victims are going to be heard is by having someone on our side. This being a Victims Minister being appointed into Government.
A Victims Minister would solely be for Victims and thier families and be there to back us up with any issues that need raising.
We do have the Ministry of Justice but looking through and also past experience it is only there to help criminals and nothing set in stone for victims or witnesses.
Please sign and give support for those vicitms of crime to be allowed a Victims Minister.
